comment: Susan Munoz was one of the best teachers that I have had to this point at Kennesaw State University. She was extremely knowledgable about her subject material and she really worked with her students so that they gained confidence in their Spanish speaking abilities. I would undoubtedly take her class again and I recommend her class to everyone.

I have had her for SPAN1001 and SPAN1002 she is the best teacher ever! She takes attendance so come to class but trust me she makes class fun. She is so kind and cares about her students and you will never want to skip this class. She makes learning Spanish easy and fun. Homework is online and its easy! Take her if you can you won't regret it!!!
Sra. Muñoz is the best! She did a great job helping me brush up my forgotten high school Spanish, and I am even taking her again next semester for Spanish 1102.
Great teacher! She is fun to have and cares about her students.

Loved her so much i was scared to get back into spanish but she is such a good teacher and makes me want to learn definitely take her she goes at your pace whenever their is a test or a speaking presentation 10/10
